description: GFD: An event modifies the quantity of resources available to one or more agents; some parts could be delegated to Links

action.description: a verb that classifies the type of event; if we want Actions unbounded, this must be a hash of the Action object

inputOf.description: The name[s] or hash[es] of the Process[es] or Transfer[s] to which this Event is an input; COULD want to be a Links though if there will be searches on this attribute

affects.description: #Resource identifying the resource whose quantities are affected by the event

receiver.description: #Agent whom the intended, committed, or actual economic event is for.

under.description: #Agreement between agents which specifies the rules or policies which govern this event.

scope.description: a #any that is the context for the event

affectedQuantity.description: the receiver gets this many of event.affects.  If a number, the resource must be quantified as its own unit

units.description: The name of an appropriate unit for measuring a quantity of the affected resource

quantity.description: this is how many event.affects changed hands
